description:
All info Server Windows

InfluxDB , Telegraf, Windows

targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'C:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Processes") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("Threads") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "system"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_users") FROM system WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Context_Switches_persec") AS "Context Switches persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("System_Calls_persec") AS "System Calls persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") AS "% Free Space" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("Percent_Disk_Read_Time") AS "% Disk Read Time", mean("Percent_Disk_Write_Time") AS "% Disk Write Time" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") AS "Current Disk Queue Length" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("inodes_free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received persec", mean("Packets_Sent_persec") AS "Packets Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$network/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s) FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s) FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s) FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Handle_Count") as "Handle Count" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Working_Set") as "Working Set" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Working_Set") as "% MemoryUsed" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(linear)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Process
list.name: process
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Drive
list.name: drive
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Network
list.name: network
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

title: InfluxDB Windows Server Telegraf
